body.name: 2.4GHz Wireless Gaming Headphones for PS5, 7.1 Surround Sound Bluetooth Gaming Headset with Microphone for PC, PS4, PS5, Switch, Mac, 50Hr Battery, Cool RGB, Ergonomic Design, 50mm Drivers
body.stockDetail: Only 18 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 52 mins
features: 🏆【Immerse in Sound Excellence】Explore auditory brilliance with our wireless gaming headset. The 50mm titanium-plated driver ensures deep bass and clear highs, highlighting every detail from teammates' voices to gunshots. With 7.1 professional mode, dive into cinematic 3D stereo surround sound. Elevate your sound experience today. 🎁 Perfect for Christmas and birthdays, a great gift for boys, girls, family, and friends. 🎁

🎵【Voice Precision Redefined】Elevate your voice with our dual beamforming microphones. Free from mic arm constraints. Experience unparalleled clarity through our exclusive noise-canceling technology. Your teammates will hear you clearly, ensuring strategic communication and precise sound localization. The microphone is not available when connected to the SWITCH

🚀【Versatile Connectivity Options】Experience triple connection options with our wireless PC headset. Achieve 20ms ultra-low latency audio using the 2.4GHz USB dongle. Swiftly switch to the latest Bluetooth 5.4 mode with a double-click of the mic button, ensuring sub-48ms latency and capturing every gaming sound. Alternatively, enjoy 0-latency audio with the Type-C wired mode.

🔋【Impressive Battery Life】Our wireless gaming headphones are equipped with a 1200mAh battery, complete with a low battery reminder for prompt recharging. Experience swift 3-hour USB-C charging, providing up to 30-35 hours of battery life with dynamic RGB lighting or an impressive 50 hours without RGB. Whether you're deep into music or indulging in lengthy gaming sessions, this PC gaming headset ensures uninterrupted performance all day on a single charge.

🎧【Ergonomic Excellence】Immerse in ultimate comfort using the wireless headset for Switch. The adjustable headbands alleviate pressure, accommodating all ages. Legendary breathable earmuffs ensure uninterrupted gaming by isolating noise. Crafted for mobile gaming pros, they remain sweat-free and convenient. When the cool RGB lighting effect is enabled, it adds a stylish touch to your gaming experience.

🎧 【Versatile Platform Compatibility】Enjoy multi-platform versatility with our wireless gaming headphones. The 2.4GHz mode is compatible with PS5, PC, PS4, Switch (mic not supported), Mac, and laptops via the USB dongle. Switch seamlessly to Bluetooth mode for compatibility with mobile phones, tablets, iPads, and other smart devices. The included Type-C cable ensures compatibility with PS4, and PS5 consoles, and PCs for an expansive gaming experience.

⚠️ Note 1: All modes are Not compatible with the Xbox. Note 2: The microphone is non-operational when connected to the Switch in Bluetooth mode. Note 3: Bluetooth mode is Not compatibility with the PS4 or PS5 console.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Connects well. I switch between PC and consoles a lot so it’s nice having a wireless one you don’t have to go through the Bluetooth process with. Very comfortably ear pads, sound quality is good but can be kinda quiet. Lights are cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for the cost…
reviews.reviewText: These are nice, fit well and comfortable. I like the voice feedback is actual words when you turn on and off and activate or deactivate the RGB and microphone features. The sound quality is very nice and they (for now) seem quite durably made 5+ stars especially considering the low cost. Highly recommended I would buy these again…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice headphones
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable. High quality sound. Appealing colours and stylish headphones. I'm satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Capable of Excellence, just needs a little tweaking.
reviews.reviewText: This was more of a 3.5 Stars, I rounded up. Generally, its good BUT you must adjust equalizer settings to get decent audio.Here is more detailed:I was going to return this, because the sound quality was abysmal. Like so bad, I tested it on my phone, and my laptop, and PC. Its highest settings is 48000 Htz (DVD Quality) wired, or Bluetooth; however, I adjusted my equalizer settings, on my PC, and was able to make it sound great. The range on the wireless is great. I am able to use it in my entire apartment, as well as the patio outside. What really amazed me was the battery. You will definitely not outlast it. It doesn't block outside noise (through the speakers, i mean), but for me that is ok. The microphone isn't what I would hope. But its good enough for what I paid. Oh, finally: There is an on/off button for the mic, so you can be sure its off when you want it to be. It even has a voice that says "Microphone Off".Overall, its great in almost every aspect except for the need to adjust equalizer settings. The mic could be better. You will have to change it back when you change to speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bruh. For this cost these are absolutely amazing! Lightweight, the sound is great, and the battery life is great. Only thing there is no noise cancellation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant at first, because for me, buying headphones that are comfortable wearing around the ears for long periods of time ,and sound quality are two biggest things for me... and battery life, but for now that's on the back burner until they need to be fully charged- im just going off of the amount of time they were charged...The padding around the ears is so soft and perfect for wearing for long periods of time...and OMG the sound quality!!! Absolutely did NOT disappoint!So Stoked I came across these BT headphones... I only charged them up maybe 20 min, once that little light turned green, you know you're a gamer/nerd when you get excited over headphones. Like a kid in a candy store with diabetes... My face lit up once I heard that night blues soundtrack on YT... I got so excited to see how they would sound... So I went through the instructions and hooked them up to my home PC and Let me tell you...YAAAAAS !! Get you a pair of these ASAP Rocky!! <3-Thank you from a Very satisfied customer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don’t often write reviews but for this one I will. Lots of compliments from my friends on the mic quality. The sound quality is great. Long battery life. Audio delay over wireless is very small and RGB lights. Best bang per buck I’ve ever had on a headset.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had these for about a month now and they’re honestly amazing. The sound quality is really good and the microphone is great too. I use these with my ps5 and they pair super good 😊
Je ne m'attendais pas à autant de confort avec se casque je le recommande niveau rapport qualité prix cest parfait.
Le cuffiette vanno bene essendo in bluetooth però ho avuto problemi col maus per via di frequenze

👍SE CONECTAN A TELÉFONOS y TV POR BLUETOOTH Y PS4/PS5 POR EL USB DONGLE👍BUENA CALIDAD DE SONIDO.👍HE REALIZADO LLAMADAS Y ME DICEN SE ESCUCHA MUY BIEN.👍 CÓMODOS Y PLEGABLES.----------------------------------💡-TECLA/Luz /1 click : Luces activar/desactivar💡-TECLA/Luz /doble click: Activar 7.1 soundround💡-TECLA/Luz /mantener 3s: Emparejar dispositivo 🎤- TECLA/micrófono/1 click: Micrófono activar/desactivar 🎤-TECLA/micrófono/mantener: Activar bluetooth o receptor dongleApretar tecla volumen +/- juntas 6s borra todo

Wir haben das Headset für die Playstation 4 gekauft.Die Verbindung ging kinderleicht. Der Klang ist super, das Mikro top.Macht qualitativ einen hochwertigen Eindruck auf uns.Wir sind absolut zufrieden.

Ho preso queste cuffie per sostituire le vecchie con cavo che usavo sul PC e ne sono rimasto particolarmente sorpreso.Dopo qualche settimana di utilizzo direi che sono promosse a pieni voti. Qualità audio molto buona, per la fascia di prezzo in cui si collocano,e la voce dal microfono si sente pulita e forte.La durata della batteria è nella media, per l'uso che ne faccio (qualche ora nei giorni settimanali e molto più stressata nel week end) mi fa tranquillamente una settimana con una carica.L'unico dubbio che ho è sull'effettiva durata nel tempo dei vari tastini di gomma, non vorrei che alla lunga si rovinassero o rompessero, specialmente quello di accensione che è effettivamente il più usato. Magari averli fatti di plastica rigida sarebbe stato meglio.
